short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You’d be surprised at how difficult it is to match a color with its written name in this Kids True Color game

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You’d be surprised at how difficult it is to match a color with its written name in this Kids True Color game, a fun and educational title for future artists everywhere. You don’t even have to be an aspiring artist to benefit from this game. The premise is simple: the pencil will turn a certain color, and the word underneath will describe a certain color. If they match, press the green button. If not, press the red.
